ARABIC: قَالَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسْتَطِيعَ مَعِىَ صَبْرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'You will not be able to bear with me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He said: "You will not be able to bear with me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He answered: "You will surely not be able to bear with me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He replied, "You will not be able to have patience with me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “You will never be able to patiently stay with me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "Verily, you will not be able to have patience with me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Surely you cannot have patience with me
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said he, 'Assuredly thou wilt not be able to bear with me patiently.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Lo! thou canst not bear with me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He replied, "You will not be able to bear with me patiently.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: verily thou wilt not be able to have with me patience;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Indeed you cannot have patience with me!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (The other) said: "Verily thou wilt not be able to have patience with me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He (Khidr) said: "Verily! You will not be able to have patience with me!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: You will not bear patiently with me' He replied.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “You will not be able to endure with me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "Indeed, with me you will never be able to have patience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:67] Said he, ‘Truly you will not be able to bear with me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Moses: (Lo! thou canst not bear with me) for you may see me doing something that you will not be able to bear. 320
